short.es: 'sideRSS' - Lector de RSS en el panel lateral
short.ja: 'sideRSS' - サイドパネルの RSS リーダー
short.ru: 'sideRSS' — программа чтения RSS в боковой панели.
short.zh_CN: 'sideRSS' - sidePanel 中的 RSS 阅读器

long.ar,de,es,fr,hi,id,ja,ru,zh_CN:
sideRSS allows RSS readers to be created in the side panel.

How to use.
- Activate shortcut is Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+S
- (Optional) Pin the extension's icon to your toolbar!
- Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar to activate the sideRSS pane.
- Alternatively, right-click on any page and click the icon in the context menu.
- Subscribe to the RSS feeds you want to subscribe to in the Feeds tab.
- Press the Reload button in the Inbox tab.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
■sideRSS
Get a simple overview of your RSS/Atom feed reader with side panel. sideRSS is the RSS reader that seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browsing experience.

■Key Features:
- Side Panel Integration: Access your feeds without leaving your current tab
- Quick Feed Overview: Instantly see new/unread posts from your subscribed feeds
- Intuitive Management: Organize and customize your feed list effortlessly
- Cross-Format Support: Compatible with both RSS and Atom feeds

The best RSS Feed Reader extension for Chrome.
If you have any feedback, bugs or issues, we're always listening on our support form: https://forms.gle/qvh1EqQU1r8Fkjdx8. If any RSS or Atom feeds don't work please report it to us.

■How to use.
- Activate shortcut is Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+S
- (Optional) Pin the extension's icon to your toolbar!
- Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar to activate the sideRSS pane.
- Alternatively, right-click on any page and click the icon in the context menu.
- Subscribe to the RSS feeds you want to subscribe to in the Feeds tab.
- Press the Reload button in the Inbox tab.
